mapper.insert:
REPLACE INTO tb_haikang_acs_door_events ( id, company_id, event_id, event_name, event_time, person_id, card_no, person_name, org_index_code, org_name, door_name, door_index_code, door_region_index_code, pic_uri, svr_index_code, event_type, in_and_out_type, reader_dev_index_code, reader_dev_name, dev_index_code, dev_name, identity_card_uri, receive_time, job_no, student_id, cert_no ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.companyId}, #{item.eventId}, #{item.eventName}, #{item.eventTime}, #{item.personId}, #{item.cardNo}, #{item.personName}, #{item.orgIndexCode}, #{item.orgName}, #{item.doorName}, #{item.doorIndexCode}, #{item.doorRegionIndexCode}, #{item.picUri}, #{item.svrIndexCode}, #{item.eventType}, #{item.inAndOutType}, #{item.readerDevIndexCode}, #{item.readerDevName}, #{item.devIndexCode}, #{item.devName}, #{item.identityCardUri}, #{item.receiveTime}, #{item.jobNo}, #{item.studentId}, #{item.certNo} )
